name: Flock Frenzy
description:
Flock Frenzy

Gather your followers and guide them to safety. Watch out for monsters along the way though! Oh yeah, and your followers are kinda dumb, so you might want to stick close by--maybe give them a nudge even. When monsters get too close your followers will panic, so be sure to keep them calm if you want them to follow. Reach the goal with the minimum required followers to win! And don't even think about trying to enter the goal without enough followers...let's just say it's uh...dangerous for the followers.

Controller recommended for optimal play.

Xbox Controller:

  • Movement: D-pad or Left Stick
  • Calm Followers: X
  • Projectile: A
  • Dash: B
  • Pause: Start
  • Exit: Esc

Keyboard/Mouse

  • Movement: WASD or Arrows
  • Calm Followers: Enter or Middle Mouse Button
  • Projectile: Space Bar or Left Mouse Button
  • Dash: E or Right Mouse Button
  • Pause: Start or P
  • Exit: Esc

This game was made in 2 weeks for the GameMaker Studio 2 Beta Jam 2
